galleries.name: AUTOMATIC DOORS
galleries.description: Automatic commercial doors often utilize motion sensors and / or push buttons to activate automatic operators to automatically open and close, providing a seamless and convenient user experience.

subDescriptions.description: Avoid discriminatory openings and access by automating your doors.
We can automate existing doors, or add new doors and operators.  The options are endless!

images.alt: Double Acting Wood Doors with Operator
Exterior view of accessible automatic glass tri-part door
Exterior view of two black automatic glass doors

galleries.name: MANUAL DOORS
galleries.description: New doors and hardware can change and upgrade the entire look and function of your space. We can do full replacement including frames, or simply just the slab.

subDescriptions.description:
### Full Line of Doors
* Interior or exterior doors
* Impact or non-impact
* Wood, fiberglass or steel
* Traffic doors

### Wide Array of Hardware
* Panic hardware
* Electric panic hardware
* Door closers
* Perimeter Soundproofing kits
* Sweeps"

images.alt: Gray double doors with half-height windows at the top of each
Single gray door with vent at bottom
